00041 #define _ray_cpp

00046 
00047 #include "ray.h"
00048 
00049 #include <Ogre.h>
00050 
00051 #include <ostream>
00052 
00053 namespace phys
00054 {
00055     Ray::Ray():From(0,0,0),To(0,1,0)
00056     {
00057 
00058     }
00059 
00060     Ray::Ray(Vector3 From_, Vector3 To_)
00061     {
00062         this->From=From_;
00063         this->To=To_;
00064     }
00065 
00066     Ogre::Ray Ray::GetOgreRay()
00067     {
00068         return Ogre::Ray(
00069             this->From.GetOgreVector3(),
00070             this->To.GetOgreVector3()
00071         );
00072     }
00073 
00074 }
00075 
00076 //std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Vector3& x)
00077 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::Ray& x)
00078 {
00079     stream << "[" << x.From << "," << x.To << "]";
00080     return stream;
00081 }

00083 #endif
